name: Dental Services
description: I offer services to clean and polish teeth, and recommend our patients to do so every 6 months to avoid chances of infection and cavities.

name: Dental Implements
description: I offer different procedures for replacing missing teeth e.g. dental implants, fixed caps or bridges and removable dentures.

name: Surgery
description: Simple and surgical tooth extractions including wisdom tooth extractions are carried out with proper sterilisation care.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Teeth cleaning, along with whitening and bleaching is done with utmost care, for a smile that looks not just beautiful, but also healthy.
